item.title: Polar Coordinate Graphs
item.description: Polar Coordinate Graphs Graphing in the [[Polar Coordinates|Polar Coordinate]] System The easiest way to graph polar equations is to choose values of theta and figure out the r values and then slowly plot them.

item.title: Polar Coordinates
item.description: Polar Coordinate System In Rectangular or Cartesian coordinates, a points location is given by (x, y) ![[Examples/Calc 2/cartesian coordinates.png]] In Polar Coordinates, a points location is given by (r, $\theta$)
